products.title: Osborne, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The osborne smoke is a modern reinterpretation of a classically patterned design that takes its inspiration from the beautiful free-flowing forms of natural plant-life. A gentle grey is used to print the design onto the off-white background, giving this version of the osborne a lovely, smoky aesthetic. The smoke works beautifully as a lightener in rooms where darker features dominate, without challenging the existing colour scheme.

products.title: Riviera Stripe, Smoke - Roller Blind
products.description: The riviera stripe smoke is a top quality, lightweight fabric, woven into the most contemporary of modern and eye-catching designs. Giving a full range of grey shades from charcoal, through fashionable stone greys, to a simple and pure off-white, the smoke is sure to be a great addition to your home. The colours on offer in the smoke work well as a way of adding a real depth of colour to a lightly decorated living room or front hallway.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Coated in a gently glistening satin paint, the costwold deluxe in dove grey is comprised of thick slats, a heavy duty headrail, and coordinating ladder tapes. The slats are easily adjustable to allow as much light, privacy, and ventilation as you choose. Partner the dove grey with soft whites in a nursery to produce a soothing, tranquil atmosphere perfect for a small infant. Add gentle prints featuring sweet animal characters and polka dots, including the occasional hint of subtle colour here and there.

products.title: Ivory Perfect Fit
products.description: This ivory perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Perforated Cream Filtra Perfect Fit
products.description: This perforated cream perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Cream Perfect Fit
products.description: This cream perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Real Wood Almond White Perfect Fit
products.description: The almond white perfect fit works well with tones of grey, mushroom and stone, adding a dash of light cream to a room to balance darker furnishings. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Real Wood Sandstone White Perfect Fit
products.description: A slightly less intense white than their real wood lightbox white, this sandstone white gives a clean feel to any room. Can be used to make a subtle contrast to white walls, or as a statement piece with other neutral tones. Perfect for windows such as those within conservatories or with protruding handles. Struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Double Cream Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Rigid aluminium slats are beautifully showcased in double cream gloss, a soft and sumptuous hue with a high-beam shine. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors.

products.title: Fagel Ivory Roman Blind
products.description: Their fagel range will add the cosy feel to your home. This range comes in many colours which would suit any room. products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a creamy ivory tone, the cotswold deluxe in oyster parades a subtly sheen paint on wide, sturdy slats with matching components. For flexible light, ventilation, and privacy, simply tilt the slats to your desired degree. Invite country sophistication into your home by teaming the oyster with vintage pinks and an accenting sage green in the master bedroom. Include light, naked woods and dreamy florals, dressing the bed linen with plush chenille throws and cushions for an added touch of luxe.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The cotswold deluxe in smoke grey is aptly named, with its high quality slats and matching components, including woven linen ladder ribbons for streamlined appeal. The slats are easily adjusted, allowing you to let in as much or as little light and air as you need. Build a stunningly unusual decor scheme in your home office by setting the smoke grey against a navy blue feature wall. Paint the remaining walls in white or matching pale grey and furnish the room with grey furniture and navy accessories.

products.title: Mayfair, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: Include the contemporary mayfair in ivory within any dcor scheme for a fresh and elegant effect. Supple, fine threads create a nimble and relaxed, cotton-like cloth that works to form an effortless blind with simple style and a sophisticated finish. Blend the ivory with sumptuous linens in alike and gentle shades of silk and biscuit to craft an inviting surrounding, draping the blind in a rich royal blue to both frame the modern hue and introduce a striking burst of contrasting colour.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Luna Softshade Cream Day And Night Blind
products.description: Make the most of natural light in your home without compromising on privacy with the luna softshade cream day and night roller blind. This design of alternating beige fabric and voile strips looks clean and modern for accessorising any setting whilst the innovative opening and closing function allows light to penetrate at the same time as giving you a sense of peace and seclusion. This 100% cotton butterfly botanist carmine curtain fabric mixes eye-catching contemporary design with a saturated colour palette to create these stunning curtains. These curtains will look beautiful paired with light sage greens and natural wooden tones throughout the home, a perfect addition for dining/ living areas within the home.

products.title: Autumn Wood Butterscotch Curtain
products.description: The autumn wood butterscotch curtain features everything that we love about this autumnal season from bushy-tailed orange foxes, spikey brown hedgehogs and enchanting owls. Also scattered around this design are tiny animal footprints and little acorns all printed on the soft cream 100% cotton-based fabric. This curtain is a firm favourite and will go down a hit with little ones. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this curtain comes with their free five-year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.title: Langden, Linen - Roman Blind
products.description: If you love light green shades but find limes a little overpowering for your home, the langden in linen could be the roman blind for you. The subtlest shade of mint green, melded with pure white, forms a retro-hippy, paisley-like pattern with a little colour and a lot of character. Give your home office a crisp, linen lift by surrounding this roman blind with white walls and smaller amounts of minty green.

products.title: Sayuri, Linen - Roman Blind
products.description: Creamy white and lime green take centre stage in this cool, calm, and collected offering from the sayuri range. The linen's painted floral pattern is pretty and wistful, providing an attractively chic addition to any room. Create calming luxe to your family bathroom by adding the linen to a white suite with matching snow tiles, and including pops of matching lime throughout the room in items such as towels, bath mats, and ornaments.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Warm Cream Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their warm cream colour - a contemporary take on a traditional neutral tone. products.title: Cellular Ivory Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Cream
products.description: With its mid-cream colour, the day & night woven cream roller blind is perfect for a more neutral interior style, and pairs with other cream furnishings to offer a coherent look. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Real Wood Grey Pearl Perfect Fit
products.description: The neutral hue of grey pearl pairs beautifully with all colours, making a stylish yet safe choice for the home. Grey can be used to cool vibrant colours or to give a touch of contrast to other neutral tones. Like all of their real wood perfect fit range, we stock a colour-matched venetian blind so you can coordinate your windows and doors struggling to cover your french doors? Wooden perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Oyster White Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: With its shimmering pearlescent hue, oyster white has a subtle gloss finish that's utterly charming in sunlit spaces. Made from hard wearing and moisture-resistant aluminium, it's ideal for busy or humid spaces such as conservatories, and its direct-to-pane fitting is ideal for 'tricky' windows and patio doors. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Delicate Cream Satin Perfect Fit
products.description: Fitting snugly into the window frame, perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories and patio doors. Aluminium blinds are their most hard wearing style, ideal for busy or humid spaces. Their delicate cream satin slat offers a softer take on pure white, with a shimmering mid-gloss for a pearlescent effect. Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Heritage, Sandstone - Roman Blind
products.description: The sandy grey of the heritage sandstone provides a beautifully neutral base adorned with birds, flowers, and foliage in an attractive charcoal shade, with ice white detailing. These naturally toned hues mean that this is a versatile blind that will work as part of a number of dcor schemes. The sandstone would work wonderfully as part of a neutral hallway or upstairs landing, or even in the downstairs cloakroom or utility.

products.title: Finch Toile, Buttercup - Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous floral imagery of the finch toile buttercup sits beautifully next to the pretty bird illustrations, whilst the lemon and charcoal colouring is a stunning combination. With white detailing to offset the richer tones, the look is eye-catching and attractive. Bring an ethereal nature theme to your kitchen by using this fashionable colour scheme alongside the ultra-pretty buttercup as your main feature.

products.title: Heathland, Linen - Roman Blind
products.description: Create a soothing and comforting area of the home by using neutral tones, where the oatmeal base of the heathland linen blind is perfect for crafting a subtle colour scheme, whilst the distinctive dove and shrubbery print adds a pinch of charming character. Combine the linen with flattering tones of taupe, caramel, and cream to generate a tranquil and comforting effect, adding hints of personality by including delicate woodland prints and opulent fabrics.

products.title: Crushed Velvet, Ivory - Roman Blind
products.description: Adopt an elegant and sophisticated look with the lustre in ivory through its bountiful fabric and tempting, lustrous shade. A foundation of refined, velvety material with a smoky grey hue produces elegant style with a regal and inviting feel. Astound your guests by incorporating fulsome texture and rich colour, through harmonising the soothing ivory with cream, silver, and caramel hues to create a neutral and sophisticated base, adding alike fabrics and quilted florals for just a dash of creative charm.
